RelatedSentence: Opening May 24 , Soak City offers 18 acres of fun for the whole family , including over 30 slides and attractions perfect for the young and the young - at - heart .
Choo - Choo Lagoon and Splash Zone highlight just some of the areas for young children , while Dragster H20 and Zoom Flume are perfect for thrill - seekers of any age .
Members of the military can also receive free admission into Soak City , Saturday through Monday , May 24-26 .
